T02TD1590E:107a-1: shr'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a h'a na /
T02TD1590E:107a-3: dpal rdo rje 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1590E:107a-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1590E:107a-5: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1590E:107b-0: khams gsum @107b pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1590E:107b-3: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1590E:107b-4: rtogs pa gcig gi spyod yul de //
T02TD1590E:107b-5: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02TD1590E:107b-6: mdor bsdus bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1590E:107b-7: zhal gnyis ma dang don grub ma ;
T02TD1590E:107b-8: / dbu bcad la sogs chos drug rnams //
T02TD1590E:107b-9: bsdus phyir yang dag don gsal ba'i //
T02TD1590E:107b-10: dmar chung ma yi sgrub thabs bri //
T02TD1590E:107b-11: dbang bskur yang dag don thob nas //
T02TD1590E:107b-12: gnyug ma'i don rnams ma lus bya //
T02TD1590E:107b-13: bla ma sangs rgyas dkon mchog la //
T02TD1590E:107b-14: dang ba'i yid kyis skyabs song nas //
T02TD1590E:107b-15: sems can don rab dga' ba la //
T02TD1590E:107b-16: byang chub tu ni sems kyang bzung //
T02TD1590E:107b-17: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas //
T02TD1590E:107b-18: bar chad bsal la dben pa ru //
T02TD1590E:107b-19: khong tshangs can gyi stan bting la //
T02TD1590E:107b-20: yab la bltas te gnas par bya //
T02TD1590E:107b-21: sngags pas tho rangs re zhig langs ;
T02TD1590E:107b-22: / me yi bu dang chu skyes dang //
T02TD1590E:107b-23: a'a li k'a li nir bcas dang //
T02TD1590E:107b-24: hr'ir bcad bcom ldan bskyed par bya //
T02TD1590E:107b-25: de nas skad cig rang lhar gnas //
T02TD1590E:107b-26: dbyangs yig gsal byed ka shas brgyan //
T02TD1590E:107b-27: yig btul rgyal po 'di yin pas //
T02TD1590E:107b-28: logs su 'thor ba bsdus pa med //
T02TD1590E:107b-29: de dag sgyu gzugs rang bzhin las //
T02TD1590E:107b-30: ka p'a la yi chang la ni //
T02TD1590E:107b-31: nam mkha' lding gis bkab gyur te //
T02TD1590E:107b-32: aom dang h'um gis rab sbyangs nas //
T02TD1590E:107b-33: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis yum la mchod //
T02TD1590E:107b-34: bam ham hrim hrem h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:107b-35: zla gam bdud rtsis gtso la mchod //
T02TD1590E:107b-36: g-yon pas g-yas la rdo rje'i khrus //
T02TD1590E:107b-37: rab tu byas te dag byas nas //
T02TD1590E:107b-38: g-yas kyis g-yon la de bzhin mchod //
T02TD1590E:107b-39: padma'i phyag rgyas rang la bsdu //
T02TD1590E:107b-40: de rjes lte ba snying ga dang //
T02TD1590E:107b-41: mgrin pa smin mtshams spyi gtsug dang //
T02TD1590E:107b-42: lte ba la sogs gnas drug tu //
T02TD1590E:107b-43: bam ham hrim hrem h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:107b-44: mthil dang dkar dang dmar ba dang //
T02TD1590E:107b-45: nag dang ser dang ljang ba rnams //
T02TD1590E:107b-46: go rims bzhin du rab tu dgod //
T02TD1590E:107b-48: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02TD1590E:107b-49: aom gri hna gri hna h'um /
T02TD1590E:107b-50: grihn'a pa pa gri hn'a pa ya h'um: a'a ya ho: bha ga b'an badzra r'a dza h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:107b-52: sngo ba ljang dang dmar ba dang //
T02TD1590E:107b-53: ser ba dag gi khro bo dgod //
T02TD1590E:108a-2: / dam pa rnams ni spyan drangs te //
T02TD1590E:108a-3: bdun kyis [*gyis] bstod nas rang la bsdu //
T02TD1590E:108a-4: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sngon song nas //
T02TD1590E:108a-5: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha: sarbbadharmm'a: sva bh'a ba bi shuddho& ham /
T02TD1590E:108a-6: aom yo ga shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02TD1590E:108a-7: aom badzra shuddha: sarbba dharmm'a badzra shuddho&amp ;
T02TD1590E:108a-9: zhes pa dag pa rnam pa gsum bsam //
T02TD1590E:108a-10: me yi bu dang h'um gyur pas //
T02TD1590E:108a-11: nyi ma sna tshogs rdo rje dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-12: rdo rje'i gur dang ra bar bsam //
T02TD1590E:108a-13: de nas me bu chu skyes dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-14: a'a li k'a li khri las gdan //
T02TD1590E:108a-15: rdzogs pa nyid du bskyed par bya //
T02TD1590E:108a-17: gri gug de nyid re res mtshan //
T02TD1590E:108a-18: skad cig tsam gyis lte dkyil du //
T02TD1590E:108a-19: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma nyid bsam //
T02TD1590E:108a-20: gcer bu'i cha byad sgra grol ma //
T02TD1590E:108a-21: g-yon pa khro mo spyan gsum pa //
T02TD1590E:108a-22: mche ba zur gsum gtsigs mdzad cing //
T02TD1590E:108a-23: dbu la rus pa'i thor tshugs brgyan //
T02TD1590E:108a-24: thod pa lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1590E:108a-25: g-yas na phag gdong rna ltag gyen //
T02TD1590E:108a-26: sku mdog me tog sindhu ra //
T02TD1590E:108a-27: g-yas na gri gug g-yon pa na //
T02TD1590E:108a-28: thod pa khrag gis bkang ba bsnams //
T02TD1590E:108a-29: kha tv'am thod pa sum brtsegs can //
T02TD1590E:108a-30: g-yon gyi gru mo rab brten nas //
T02TD1590E:108a-31: gsang ba'i gnas su bzung ba'o //
T02TD1590E:108a-32: thod can khrag 'dzag do shal can //
T02TD1590E:108a-33: g-yon brkyang g-yas ni bskum pa yis //
T02TD1590E:108a-34: gung mo byin pa la reg pa'o //
T02TD1590E:108a-35: gcer bu mtshan ma rang bzhin gnas //
T02TD1590E:108a-36: nu 'bur rgyas pa phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1590E:108a-37: rus pa'i dbu rgyan snyan cha dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-38: mgul chu do shal phyag gdub dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-39: se mo do dang zhabs gdub dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-40: dpung rgyan sku chings stod g-yogs can //
T02TD1590E:108a-41: g-yas su 'gying zhing g-yon du ldem //
T02TD1590E:108a-42: 'gying bag can la mthu byin ldan //
T02TD1590E:108a-45: stong gsum kun snyoms thugs rjer ldan //
T02TD1590E:108a-46: rngam zhing srin po'i zhal ni bsdams //
T02TD1590E:108a-47: de ltar yongs su gnas par bya'o ;
T02TD1590E:108a-48: / bla ma'i gdams ngag las kyis ni //
T02TD1590E:108a-49: rim pa rgyas par rtogs par bya //
T02TD1590E:108a-50: dza: h'um bam ho: sa dgug gzhug dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-51: aom dang a'a: dang h'um gsum gyis //
T02TD1590E:108a-52: gnas gsum pa ni 'thor bsdu dang //
T02TD1590E:108a-53: de nas gnas drug sngar bzhin du //
T02TD1590E:108a-54: go cha'i lha mo'i sku rdzogs nas //
T02TD1590E:108b-0: snying gar @108b sa bon rab tu brgyan //
T02TD1590E:108b-1: de nas spyan drangs mchod bstod de //
T02TD1590E:108b-2: yang gshegs sku brjid byon pa las //
T02TD1590E:108b-3: dbang bskur tshig gis rab mnyan te //
T02TD1590E:108b-4: mkha' 'gro bzhin yis dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1590E:108b-5: ye shes sems dpa' ma nyes byas nas //
T02TD1590E:108b-6: dbu la mi bskyod rtags kyis mdzes //
T02TD1590E:108b-8: gnas nyid du ni rnam par thim //
T02TD1590E:108b-9: de sprul bcu drug spros pa yis //
T02TD1590E:108b-10: nyid la nyid kyis rnam par mchod //
T02TD1590E:108b-11: rkang pa brgyad pas yongs bstod te //
T02TD1590E:108b-12: rang nyid bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
T02TD1590E:108b-13: rlung gi sa bon me yi bu //
T02TD1590E:108b-15: rlung dang gru gsum dza ril las //
T02TD1590E:108b-16: thod pa padmas rab mdzes h'um //
T02TD1590E:108b-17: bhr'um dang aam dang dzam dang kham //
T02TD1590E:108b-18: na dang da dang ha dang go //
T02TD1590E:108b-19: sku las de rnams rgyas par bskyed //
T02TD1590E:108b-21: me sbar sku gsung thugs kyis sbyang //
T02TD1590E:108b-22: rdo rje sbu gus rab tu myang //
T02TD1590E:108b-23: lte bar chos 'byung kha sbyor la //
T02TD1590E:108b-24: rdza ma mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin //
T02TD1590E:108b-25: kha dog dmar po 'od zer ldan //
T02TD1590E:108b-26: grub pa'i sngags kyis yongs bskor nas //
T02TD1590E:108b-27: don kun grub byed 'khor lo bsgom //
T02TD1590E:108b-28: srin po'i zhal ni cung zad bsdams //
T02TD1590E:108b-29: phag gdong gyen du nye bar blta //
T02TD1590E:108b-31: snying nang sa bon grub bcas la //
T02TD1590E:108b-32: bskor zhing 'khor lo rab tu bskyod //
T02TD1590E:108b-33: dang po bskyed tshul rab rdzogs te //
T02TD1590E:108b-34: ae nas bam la rnam par bsdu //
T02TD1590E:108b-35: thig le n'a dar cung zad bsdams //
T02TD1590E:108b-36: dgongs pa chos nyid dag tu bskyal //
T02TD1590E:108b-37: de longs spyod lam ci rigs pas //
T02TD1590E:108b-38: nga rgyal nyid kyis rnam par spyad //
T02TD1590E:108b-39: de nas sngags rnams rnam par bshad //
T02TD1590E:108b-40: aom sarbba buddha d'a ki n'i ye //
T02TD1590E:108b-41: badzra warnna n'i ye badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um h'um /
T02TD1590E:108b-43: aom d'a ki n'i ye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-44: aom l'a ma ye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-45: aom khanda ro he hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-46: aom r'u pi n'i ye hum h'um phat phat sv'a h'a aom k'a k'a sye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-47: aom a'u lu k'a sye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-48: aom sva n'a sye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-49: aom s'u ka r'a sye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-50: aom ya ma d'a ti ye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-51: aom ya ma d'u t'i ye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-52: aom ya ma dam shtvi n'i ye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:108b-53: aom ya ma ma th'a n'i ye hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-1: mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ya hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-2: aom ma h'a k'a wp'a gni sanni bh'a ya hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-3: aom dza ta ma ku totka t'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-4: aom dam shtv'a ka r'a lo gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-5: aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a su r'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-6: aom par shu p'a sho dya sh'u la kha tv'am ga dha ri ne hum h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-7: aom by'a ghra dzi n'a mba ra dha ra ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-8: aom ma h'a dhu mth'a na dha ka ra wa push'a ya hum h'um phat /
T02TD1590E:109a-9: aom bam hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1590E:109a-10: aom ham yom hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1590E:109a-11: aom hrim mam hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1590E:109a-12: aom hrem hrim hum h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1590E:109a-13: aom hum h'um hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1590E:109a-14: aom phat phat hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1590E:109a-15: gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya //
T02TD1590E:109a-16: rdo rje can gyi mchod pa ni //
T02TD1590E:109a-17: tshes bcu'i dus kyi khyad par du //
T02TD1590E:109a-18: mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1590E:109a-19: bza' ston de bzhin btung ba dang //
T02TD1590E:109a-20: bu ram shing dang rgun 'brum dang //
T02TD1590E:109a-21: 'bras la sogs pa ji snyed pas //
T02TD1590E:109a-22: btung ba bzang po ji snyed pas //
T02TD1590E:109a-23: phyi dang gsang bar bcas pa mchod ;
T02TD1590E:109a-24: / snod ni dri med sbyangs pa ru //
T02TD1590E:109a-25: gur gum la sogs sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1590E:109a-26: btung ba bzang dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1590E:109a-27: sindhu ra yi phye ma btsags //
T02TD1590E:109a-28: gser gyi smyu gu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1590E:109a-29: blo dang ldan pas ae dbyibs bris //
T02TD1590E:109a-30: dbus su sngags kyi rgyal po ni //
T02TD1590E:109a-31: rim pa de bzhin bri bar bya//
T02TD1590E:109a-32: g-yung drung 'khyil pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1590E:109a-33: dge ba 'khor lo'i logs la dgod //
T02TD1590E:109a-34: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs nyid //
T02TD1590E:109a-35: chu las skyes dang thal las skyes //
T02TD1590E:109a-36: mar me ts'a ru dam tshig che //
T02TD1590E:109a-37: de bzhin gzhon nu ma yis mchod //
T02TD1590E:109a-38: mchod pa'i khyad par 'di dag gis //
T02TD1590E:109a-39: nye ba nyid du byas pa yin ;
T02TD1590E:109a-40: / skra grol gcer bur byas nas su //
T02TD1590E:109a-41: ao dya na phyogs su kha bltas nas //
T02TD1590E:109a-42: shin tu gsang bar bya ba nyid //
T02TD1590E:109a-43: mchod pa'i dus su mnyam par gzhag / ma gsang bgegs kyis bar chod pas //
T02TD1590E:109a-44: dngos grub de bzhin nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD1590E:109a-45: dam tshig nyams par gyur pa la ;
T02TD1590E:109a-48: 'chi ba'i dus la bab kyang bla'i //
T02TD1590E:109a-49: gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na //
T02TD1590E:109a-50: dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1590E:109a-51: khams gsum brtan dang g-yo ba yi //
T02TD1590E:109b-1: / g-yon pa sngon du bskyed pa ste //
T02TD1590E:109b-2: rnal 'byor rtag tu g-yon pas spyad //
T02TD1590E:109b-3: mchod pa lag pa g-yon pa ste //
T02TD1590E:109b-4: bza' btung g-yon pas spyad pa nyid //
T02TD1590E:109b-5: rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa //
T02TD1590E:109b-6: rigs gcig tu ni res par brtag / bza' ston de bzhin btung ba dang //
T02TD1590E:109b-7: sme gtsang ngo tsha rnam par spang //
T02TD1590E:109b-8: rtog pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD1590E:109b-9: nyes pa kun las rnam par grol //
T02TD1590E:109b-10: rnal 'byor ma yi da ba sdom //
T02TD1590E:109b-11: dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod //
T02TD1590E:109b-12: sngags ni rnal 'byor ma rang bzhin //
T02TD1590E:109b-13: rnal 'byor ma ni sngags kyi gzugs //
T02TD1590E:109b-15: / de dag tha dad par mi bya //
T02TD1590E:109b-16: mi yis gang dang gang bsgom pa //
T02TD1590E:109b-17: yid dang yang dag ldan 'gyur nas //
T02TD1590E:109b-18: des na de yi bdag nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1590E:109b-19: sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin no //
T02TD1590E:109b-20: bsnyen par gyur pa'i nye ba'i rtags //
T02TD1590E:109b-21: g-yung drung bcas pa'i rje btsun ma //
T02TD1590E:109b-22: zhal nyid mthong bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD1590E:109b-23: chang ni khol bar gyur pa dang //
T02TD1590E:109b-24: rmi lam dag tu zhal mthong dang //
T02TD1590E:109b-25: 'bum tsho gsum dang gnyis dang ni //
T02TD1590E:109b-26: gcig gi bar du nye bar bsnyen //
T02TD1590E:109b-27: zla ba gcig dang zla ba phyed //
T02TD1590E:109b-28: de bzhin zhag bdun dag tu ni //
T02TD1590E:109b-29: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yin //
T02TD1590E:109b-30: mtshan ma grangs dang dus la bsnyen //
T02TD1590E:109b-31: mchod dang bar ma dman rnams kyi //
T02TD1590E:109b-32: go rims bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD1590E:109b-33: zhi rgyas dbang drag phrin las dang //
T02TD1590E:109b-34: rdo rje nang ded bzlog pa dang //
T02TD1590E:109b-36: las kyi bya ba kha skong rnams //
T02TD1590E:109b-37: gzhan yang bla ma'i thugs la rag / sems dang rjes mthun rnal 'byor gyis //
T02TD1590E:109b-38: gang zhig shin tu mnyam gzhag na //
T02TD1590E:109b-39: shes rab bsod nams dman pa yang //
T02TD1590E:109b-40: de ni grub 'gyur the tshom med //
T02TD1590E:109b-41: bla ma sangs rgyas bla ma chos //
T02TD1590E:109b-42: de bzhin bla ma dge 'dun te //
T02TD1590E:109b-43: bla ma dpal ldan rdo rje 'chad //
T02TD1590E:109b-44: mdor na bla na med pa yi ;
T02TD1590E:109b-46: de phyir bla ma'i bsnye bkur bya //
T02TD1590E:109b-47: dpal dang ldan pas rab tu bsngags pa yis //
T02TD1590E:109b-48: ao dya na mkha' 'gro las brgyud sgrub thabs 'di //
T02TD1590E:109b-49: blo ldan rnams kyis 'di bsgrubs nas //
T02TD1590E:110a-0: rje btsun ma yi zhal mthong shog / rdo rje rnal @110a * //
T02TD1590E:110a-1: 'byor ma'i gsang chen zhal nas rna par mkha' 'gro mas /
T02TD1590E:110a-2: n'a g'a dzu na la brgyud /
T02TD1590E:110a-3: des tri sa ra ha la brgyud /
T02TD1590E:110a-4: des ka ro pa la brgyud //
T02TD1590E:110a-6: des ni ru ba la brgyud /
T02TD1590E:110a-7: des ma jo g-yung mo la brgyud do //
T02TD1590E:110a-9: des bdag la brgyud pa lags so //
T02TD1590E:110a-10: rnal 'byor ma zhal gnyis ma chung du zhes kyang bya /
T02TD1590E:110a-11: don bsdus kyi dmar chung ma zhes kyang bya ba tri sa ra has mdzad pa rdzogs so//
